src/lib/components/DropWrapper.js.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

label.description: A label that will be printed when this component is rendered.

value.description: The value displayed in the input.

Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

src/lib/components/ReactDnd.react.js.description:
ReactDnd takes an array of data and statuses 
and displays them in columns for the user to drag
and update their status.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

statuses.description: List of status columns for each task

data.description: A list of current tasks and their status

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
